title: Spinning Wheel - The Best of Blood, Sweat & Tears / 2007
description:
Blood, Sweat & Tears turned out a series of impressive singles in the late '60s, led by the forceful vocals of lead singer David Clayton-Thomas.
 
This 15-track collection has the essentials, including "Spinning Wheel," a fine version of Laura Nyro's "And When I Die," "Hi-De-Ho," and the propulsive "Go Down Gamblin'."  



Blood, Sweat & Tears

Spinning Wheel:
The Best of Blood, Sweat & Tears

2007



CD / 2007 / 320Kbps
